en_us: Press {keybind:Share Item} on a gear item to share it in chat or save it.
In Overlay Management you can move, resize and change alignments of all overlays.
Every single feature in Wynntils can be toggled on or off. Most features have additional options too, check them out in the Settings menu.
With Info Boxes and Custom Bars you can display almost anything you want on your screen using Functions. Join our Discord server to find many community made overlays with {wynntils_command:discord}.
Got a question? Found a bug or want to suggest something? Join our Discord server and share it with us at {wynntils_command:discord}.
Remember to check for updates from time to time. Wynntils updates quite frequently and may contain important compatibility fixes.
Press {keybind:Screenshot Item} on an item to make a screenshot of it.
Press {keybind:View player's gear} on a player to inspect their gear or perform quick actions.
Creating a Wynntils Account will let you equip custom cosmetics. To create an account, use {wynntils_command:token}.
With the Container Scroll feature you can use your mouse scroll to navigate pages in most paginated containers with ease.
Content, raids or lootruns not tracking properly? Make sure you have the scoreboard enabled with toggle_command:sb}.
Having issues with your content tracker not updating? Enable autotracking with {toggle_command:autotracking}.
Want to focus on or remove certain chat types? Use Chat Tabs to configure what chat messages you see.
Unable to see content or lootrun beacons? Be sure to enable them with {toggle_command:beacon}.
Waypoint markers too big? Reduce their size with the Scale option in the Waypoint Distance feature.
Want to quickly find more of the same item on the trade market? Press {keybind:Quick Search TM} whilst hovering an item to instantly search for it.
